resources.string: The cost will be charged to your mobile phone bill.
Sorry. Could not load payment details.
Data connection is needed to load the payment details.
Sorry, could not detect your mobile operator.
This transaction takes longer than expected. If you wish to continue waiting, please tap \'Wait\' button. If you wish to cancel waiting and transaction, please tap \'Cancel\' button.
You have already purchased this product
You have been charged s for s
We were unable to complete the purchase. This may be caused by failed connectivity to operator\'s billing system. Also, you may have exceeded your spend limit. Please try again later.

We were unable to complete the purchase. This may be caused by slow network connection or bad connectivity to operator\'s billing system. If you receive a "purchase complete" SMS later but do not see purchased items in the application, contact us at support@fortumo.com
Mobile payments can not be made without a SIM card.
Mobile payments are unavailable in Airplane mode.
Mobile network is unavailable, device probably out of operator coverage area.
